data.name: Fastest Finger First: Q: Why Do You Answer?
data.short_description: It's time for the second group in round 3 of the regular meet at Asagaoka! The showdown between rivals Shiki and Mikuriya finally becomes reality, but once again, Akira causes a commotion. Quiz bowl is no more than a game to him. Still, Mikuriya remains calm and proactively buzzes in to answer...
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
